General.Name: Akanda Corp
General.Description: Akanda Corp., through its subsidiaries, engages in the cultivation, manufacture, and distribution of cannabis-based products for medicinal use worldwide. The company offers medicinal-grade cannabis and cannabis based medical and wellness products. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 100 King St. W, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5X 1G5

1.Name: Dr. Gurcharn  Deol B.A., M.A., Ph.D.
